landingPage.headerLogo: body > header > div > div > div.navbar-header > div

loginPage.logo: #content > section > div > div:nth-child(3) > section > h1 > a
loginPage.emailInput: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > form > fieldset > div:nth-child(1) > div > input
loginPage.passwordInput: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > form > fieldset > div:nth-child(2) > div > span
loginPage.loginButton: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > form > fieldset > div:nth-child(4) > button
loginPage.loginGoogle: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > a:nth-child(5)
loginPage.loginGithub: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > a:nth-child(6)
loginPage.forgotPasswordLink: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > a:nth-child(6)
loginPage.signUpLink: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > section > p > a:nth-child(3)
loginPage.termsofuseLink: #content > section > div > div.auth-body > div > div > section > p > a:nth-child(3)
